alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 01 at 7:00PM CDT until November 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING EXPIRES AT 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FOR WEDNESDAY NOON TO 6 PM FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 432, 433, 435, AND 436... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 432...433...435 and 436. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts around 30 mph Wednesday. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 12 to 15 percent Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
